text: The 1667 Shamakhi earthquake occurred on 25 November 1667 with an epicenter close to the city of Shamakhi, Azerbaijan (then part of Safavid Iran). It had an estimated moment magnitude scale of 6.9 and a maximum felt intensity of X (Extreme) on the Mercalli intensity scale. An estimated 80,000 people died. ==Related pages== * List of earthquakes in Azerbaijan ==References== Category:Earthquakes in Azerbaijan Category:Articles on pre-1900 earthquakes Category:November events Category:1667
title: 1667 Shamakhi earthquake
